name: Cold Winter Nights
description:
"You are stranded alone in the middle of an unknown ice desert.

Try to survive for as long as possible.
Build houses to keep you warm and unlock additional buildings.

But watch out, maybe you are not as alone as you thought..."

Controls

  • Tap on the place you want to walk to
  • Tap on an object you want to interact with
  • Tap and Hold to rotate the flashlight

Buildings

House

 Restores some Health (Build multiple to restore Health faster)

Forester

 Spawns trees in it's vicinity

Guardtower

 Reveals Monsters on Map and makes them die faster
